pages.text: Affects grace spells only. Doubles Grace XP gained on spell-cast, and increases the duration of grace spells by 10%. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_redemption)Path of Redemption$(/l)$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_the_aegis)Path of the Aegis$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter bathes in your inner kindness. Imbued onto the Graceful Scepter and persists on the Path of Redemption and the Path of the Aegis
